data_table.description: Dental History Form, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: DHSA1
variable.description: Have you lost any of your natural teeth? Q1 [Dental History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DHSA2A
variable.description: Did you lose any teeth because of cavities? Q2a [Dental History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DHSA2B
variable.description: Did you lose any teeth because of gum disease? Q2b [Dental History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DHSA2C
variable.description: Did you lose any teeth because of accident? Q2c [Dental History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DHSA2D
variable.description: Did you lose any teeth because of wisdom teeth pulled? Q2d [Dental History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DHSA2E
variable.description: Did you lose any teeth because of extracted because of overcrowding? Q2e [Dental History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DHSA2F
variable.description: Did you lose any teeth because of other? Q2f [Dental History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DHSA3
variable.description: Do you have false teeth? Q3 [Dental History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DHSA5
variable.description: Have you ever noticed any of your teeth were loose? Do not include the times when you lost your baby teeth, had braces, or had a tooth hit and made loose. Q5 [Dental History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DHSA6A
variable.description: Have you ever had a root canal done? Q6a [Dental History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DHSA6B
variable.description: Did you have a root canal done on more than one tooth? Q6b [Dental History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DHSA7
variable.description: Have you ever had a dental implant? Q7 [Dental History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DHSA8
variable.description: How often did you brush your teeth yesterday? Q8 [Dental History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DHSA9
variable.description: How often did you use dental floss last week? Q9 [Dental History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DHSA10
variable.description: When was the last time you went to the dentist for any reason? Q10 [Dental History Form, exam 4]
variable.value: Six months to less than 1 year ago
One to less than 2 years ago
Two to less than 3 years ago
Three to less than 5 years ago

variable.name: DHSA11
variable.description: Would you say that you use a dentist on a regular basis, or do you only go when you are in discomfort or when you need something fixed? Q11 [Dental History Form, exam 4]
variable.value: When something needs to be fixed

variable.name: DHSA12
variable.description: Do you have a dentist? Q12 [Dental History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DHSAFLAG
variable.description: 1= DHSA form is present [Dental History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DHSACY
variable.description: Contact year [10] [Dental History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DHSA4
variable.description: How old were you when you got your first false teeth? Q4 [Dental History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID
